segments.text: Good morning , Miss Wu ! Can I ask you something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . You are more welcome to do . What is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tomorrow is my wife's birthday . We both love spicy Chinese dishes . I am wondering if you could recommend a good local restaurant where I can find some good spicy dishes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , if spicy local dishes are what you are looking for , In Hua Restaurant is the best place to go . The restaurant serves very good and spicy local dishes . You might want to try there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How far is it from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is near the university . Five minutes ' walk from your flat , I think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . We'll go and have a try . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're welcome . May you have a good time . Please give my regards to your wife . I wish her a happy birthday tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . The same to you .
segments.speaker: S1
